    • Method Detail

      • add

        public Graph add(float value)
        Adds a floating point value to the graph.

        Normally, this will automatically increase the internal count by 1.
        If the total(int) method is called, automatic increases are immediately disabled
        Parameters:
        value - the value to add to the graph
        Returns:
        itself

      • addDesc

        public Graph addDesc(java.lang.String description)
        Adds a description to the graph which will be displayed in the middle of the screen.

        This feature will not be exported.
        Parameters:
        description - the description to add
        Returns:
        itself

      • total

        public void total(int times)
        Specifies the total amount of samples the graph is recording.

        For example, we want to graph the population over 100 years from 1900 to 2000. However, we only have values of the population at the year 1910, 1920, ..., 2000. We can add elements and the internal count rise to 10 when we add the year 2000 value. If we want to specify that we have reach the year 2000 when we add the value, we can use total(2000) to specify that.
        Parameters:
        times - the times we want to specify

      • getValue

        public float getValue(int index)
        Gets the floating point value at a particular index, out of range values are warped back in.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the value we want to get
        Returns:
        the value at that particular index

        public processing.core.PGraphics graph(int m,
                                       int n,
                                       float location,
                                       float length)
        Graph the current graph.
        Parameters:
        m - the width of the output image
        n - the height of the output image
        length - the length of the graph
        location - the location or position of the graph
        Returns:
        the PGraphics element that contains the image
